requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista ,7, 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB, AMD Radeon 7850 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista ,7, 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 7 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 1050, AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 compatible Sound Card

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 @ 2.2GHz | AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+ @ 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 240 GT | Radeon HD 6570
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The product is in early access and may be unstable

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, 8, 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: 32-bit or 64-bit CPU with SSE2 support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11 or DX12 capable; 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04 or CentOS 7
  • Processor: 64-bit only
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable; 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:

  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible Graphics Card

  • Sound Card: DirectX 8.1 Compatible
